movies.title: Monster
movies.plot: An emotionally scarred highway drifter shoots a sadistic trick who rapes her, and ultimately becomes America's first female serial killer.

events.title: Aileen Wuornos kills her first victim
Aileen Wuornos is sentenced to death

movies.title: Drum
movies.plot: A hot-shot journalist is swept up in a movement to challenge Apartheid in 1950s South Africa.
